subject: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this deal will expire TONIGHT):
$257,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://siruisxkcinaltd.com/
